newsitem.title: USA: Ryder sees Q4 charge $75-$150 million range. [CORRECTED 16:10 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Ryder sees Q4 charge $75-$150 million range. [CORRECTED 16:10 GMT]

text.p: (Corrects headline to read "$150 million" from "$100 million")
Ryder System Inc Chairman Anthony Burns said the restructuring charge the company foresees for its fourth quarter would be somewhere in the range of $75 to $150 million.

"We expect to make the announcement before the end of the year of a charge, and... it should be in the neighborhood of $75 to $150 million," he told a conference call after the company released its third quarter financial results.
He said areas the company was looking at included its market coverage, headquarters staff, vehicle and non-vehicle purchasing and facilities utilization.
